question: Will Bitcoin reach $100k by end of 2025?
description: This market will resolve to Yes if Bitcoin (BTC) reaches $100,000 USD on any major exchange by December 31, 2025, 11:59 PM UTC.

question: Will Ethereum merge succeed?
description: Market resolves to Yes if Ethereum successfully completes the merge to Proof of Stake.

question: Will AI surpass human intelligence by 2030?
description: This market resolves based on expert consensus on AGI achievement.
